author: ianna
body:
* Add a unit test
* Fix a bug in DDName

Note, it is based on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24263 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24313

@Dr15Jones and @cvuosalo - I'm not sure what was an original requirement behind a DDName design. I think, the unit test demonstrates one usecase: the registry keeps only unique names.
title: DD Name Unit Test
